titleStmt.title: A true narrative of the occasions and causes of the late Lord Gen. Cromwell's anger and indignation against Lieut. Col. George Joyce, (sometimes Cornet Joyce, who secured the King at Holmby) & his proceedings against him to casheer him from the Army, and imprison and destroy him in his estate.
titleStmt.author: Joyce, George, fl. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
